title.s1: From the goals you’ve set, what
title.s2: are the obstacles that keep you

p1.NotPrioritize: I don't prioritize the important things close to me enough.
p1.OverDriven: I'm too driven, to the point of losing sight of the journey.
p1.OverwhelmedWorld: I feel overwhelmed by a world that moves too fast.

p1.s3: Let yourself face the fear hidden

p1.s2: Let each raindrop carry away the fear
p1.s3: hidden in your heart.
p1.s4: No matter how heavy your fear feels, keep
p1.s5: going until your spirit feels lighter.

3-2-11.name: You
3-2-11.stillRaining: The rain keeps pouring so heavily... How can I make it calm down?

3-2-12.rainDoll: Maybe... try tapping on the rain doll?

3-3-1.name: You
3-3-1.why:
“Why... does it feel
like the rain will never end?”

3-3-3.name: You
3-3-3.both:
“Both the rain outside...
and the rain within my heart.”

3-3-4.perhaps:
Perhaps...this is the moment to
finally face your fears

3-3-5.areYou:
Are you ready to let go of the umbrella
and walk through the rain to overcome it?

4-1-5.goodJob: You’ve been so brave... having the courage to make a decisive step about something you’ve been uncertain about for so long

4-1-6.encounter: facing your fears is never easy,

4-1-7.foundAWay: but somehow, you’ve found a way to overcome every challenge that’s come your way.

4-1-8.dontKnow: Do you remember? This isn’t the first rainstorm you’ve faced.

4-1-9.raining: Rain comes every year, and sometimes it even falls unexpectedly, but you’ve always made it through.

4-1-10.whenYouAreChild: And when you were a child... you used to run and play in the rain with so much joy,

4-1-11.likeRain: as if the rain could never scare you, not even for a moment.

4-1-12.soAnother: So this time, it’s just another moment when the rain has come to visit.

4-1-13.remember: And remember, Just like every time before—this, too, shall pass.

4-1-14.dontKnow: I don’t know if anyone has ever told you this...

4-1-15.wantYouToKnow: but I need you to know that, despite everything you’ve been through, you’ve blossomed and grown into something truly beautiful. So proud of you. 😊

p1.s1: At first, I thought reaching the
p1.s2: goal was the most important thing.

p1.s1: It turned out that I became so focused
p1.s2: on it that I forget what I truly wanted why I
p1.s3: set this goal in the first place.

p1.s1: I forgot to take care of myself,
p1.s3: embracing everyone except myself.

p1.s1: And it seems like my sense of
p1.s2: self slowly started to fade away.

p1.s1: Maybe I've been rushing through things
p1.s2: or focusing too much on something, to the
p1.s3: point that I don't have time to reflect on who
p1.s4: I really am or what I trly am.

p1.s2: taking time to think helped you?

p1.s1: A tree rises slowly, in silence it grows,
p1.s2: Its roots dig deep where no eye knows.
p1.s3: In sunlight it basks, in storms it sways,
p1.s5: Like life, it stretches, reaching skyward high,
p1.s6: Yet anchored in earth where truths lie.
p1.s7: Through winter’s grip and summer’s gleam,
p1.s8: A tree holds steady in every dream.

p1.s1: "To you, who have found yourself once
p1.s2: again, we have a keepsake to commemorate
p1.s3: this journey that we’d like to give you."

6-3-2.butBefore:
But before you open the gift, we’d like you
to take a moment to reflect on your
feelings right now, after navigating through
the changing seasons of your mind.

6-3-3.after:
After gaining insight into your goals,
inspirations, and fears.

6-3-4.howDo:
How do you feel about this journey?
1 Not satisfied at all - 10 Extremely happy

6-3-5.andAt:
And at this moment, how much stress or
worry do you feel in your mind?
1 being the least - 10 being the most

6-3-6.couldYou:
Could you share the reason
behind your rating?

6-3-7.iSee:
I see now. So, this is how you’ve been
feeling. But no matter how you feel right
now, the most important thing is that
you’ve come to understand your own
feelings.

6-3-8.feeling:
Feeling lost might seem scary, but we all
experience that sometimes.
You might feel lost again in the future,

6-3-9.butLet:
but let today’s journey be the start of
rediscovering yourself.

6-3-10.iHope:
I hope you’ll take time to reflect on your
feelings and not lose yourself so often.

p1.s1: ประสบการณ์ที่คุณสัมผัสบนหน้าจอ…
p1.s2: เป็นเพียงจุดเริ่มต้นของการเดินทางทั้งหมด!✨
p1.s3: อย่าปล่อยให้ประสบการณ์ของคุณจบลงเพียง
p1.s4: แค่บนหน้าจอมือถือ
p1.s5: มาสัมผัส Soul Seasons ด้วยตัวคุณเอง
p1.s6: ผ่านการดื่มด่ำกับทุกองค์ประกอบที่ถูกรังสรรค์ขึ้นมา
p1.s7: อย่างงดงาม และค้นพบสิ่งที่ไม่มีวันถ่ายทอดผ่านหน้าจอได้
